item.title: Compliance as code
item.description: What is compliance as code and why to use it? First lets start with the compliance stuff. Compliance is the state of being in accordance with established guidlines or specifications, or the process of becoming so. From https://www.techtarget.com/searchdatamanagement/definition/compliance That says that there will be certain types of rules that we want to follow. When we follow these rules or strive to follow, we are compliant. Compliance in organisations Historically companies and organisations have manual process to verify that teams are following the rules.
